Class AESStages2

  • java.lang.Object
    • standard.AESStages
      • alternate.AESStages2

  • public class AESStages2
extends AESStages
    Class providing the basic stages for AES encryption and decryption using table lookup.

        Xors the 4 arguments, each argument is a byte that is expanded to 4 bytes
        Parameters:
        A - - argument for T0
        B - - argument for T1
        C - - argument for T2
        D - - argument for T3
        key - - key for encryption round
        Returns:
        bitwise xor of all parameters
